SEC_ABOUT.ABOUT_HEADER_SUBTITLE: One Step Ahead of the current Model
SEC_ABOUT.ABOUT_TITLE: We invest innovatively in exponential entrepreneurs.
SEC_ABOUT.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: We always act with the intention of using our strength to add maximum value to the ecosystem, we were born to change the game.
SEC_ABOUT.ABOUT_BOX1_DESCRIPTION: We evaluate opportunities in both equity and debt, providing alternative sources of capital for entrepreneurs and income for our LPs.
SEC_ABOUT.ABOUT_BOX2_DESCRIPTION: We have a completely transparent analysis and screening process for LPs, Family Offices and Corporates.
SEC_ABOUT.ABOUT_BOX3_DESCRIPTION: We seek to add value even before investing, consequently, more than 30% of our deal flow comes from non-invested companies.
SEC_ABOUT.ABOUT_BOX4_DESCRIPTION: We support entrepreneurs who seek to exponentialize their business, period. We don't like labels or pre defined boxes.

SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL1_CITE: Principles connect your values to your actions; they are beacons that guide your actions and help you successfully deal with the laws of reality. It is to your principles that you turn when you face hard choices.
SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL2_CITE: Uncertainty is something present, desirable and necessary for evolution.
SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL3_CITE: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity. An optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL3_OFFICE: former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL4_CITE: Success is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL4_OFFICE: former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL5_CITE: A man without a purpose is like a ship without a rudder.
SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL6_CITE: In the new world, it is not the big fish which eats the small fish, it's the fast fish which eats the slow fish.
SEC_QUOTE.QUOTE_CAROUSEL6_OFFICE: founder of the World Economic Forum

SEC_PORTFOLIO.PORTFOLIO_BOX1_DESCRIPTION: IA applied to reduce long mock exams to quick quizes, placing the student on the learning frontier.
SEC_PORTFOLIO.PORTFOLIO_BOX2_DESCRIPTION: IA applications targeted at large corporate customers.
SEC_PORTFOLIO.PORTFOLIO_BOX3_DESCRIPTION: Latin America's largest crypto investment company aimed at offering global financial products for the ever-growing demand for crypto Assets.
SEC_PORTFOLIO.PORTFOLIO_BOX4_DESCRIPTION: Communication platform for small and medium-sized companies.
SEC_PORTFOLIO.PORTFOLIO_BOX5_DESCRIPTION: Healthtech with the mission of democratizing dental health in Brazil.
